title: Halo 5: Guardians could make its way to the PC
text:
Halo 5: Guardians could make its way to the PC 
Published By: Neowin.net - Today 
In a recent interview with Halo 5's franchise development director, he stated that the possibility of the game arriving on PC has increased,... Read Full Story ... Related articles:
